notes: I’d expect W to raise to 3H instead of passing, in which case I don’t think N has an asking bid available. X would be penalty, 3S would set the suit, 3NT to play. 4-level bids sound like regular 3-suiter relays. Without interference, S would start with 3D to show 4-1-4-4 shape. Interestingly, interference helps save space here.
